name: Live vs eviL
description:
Two player tower defense game. 

Set in fantasy setting, one player is a warrior of light and another a pawn of evil. The aim is to defeat opponent by protecting yourself with towers and sending troops  to win the capital.

Game was made as a part of university course Game Design. Not completely finished yet, some features need to be added and sprites edited.

Needs to be played by two players, or you can open two windows if you want to try it by yourself. :)
